item.description:
@Xero1 wrote:

if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && (absX >= 1998 && absX <= 2017  && absY >= 4430 && absY <= 4449)) {

ok
thefirst x and y are SW corners
the 2nd are NE corners
wats the problem?
u still lose items

heres the code

if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true && (absX >= 1998 && absX <= 2017 && absY >= 4430 && absY <= 4449)) { teleportToX = 3052; teleportToY = 3480; IsDeadTeleporting = true; frame1(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
